name: Rotator Breakout
description:
This is my first game open to the public. Please consider that it is still in development, so only mechanics are available to play.

Controls: 
Space ou Left Mouse Button Launch the ball.
Mouse Control the baton.
F key after launch the ball, transform the ball in a fire ball.

Objective: Still in development.

Please leave a comment, what you think with this gameplay? Thank You.

Known bugs:

  • For some reason, sometimes the ball stack in baton.

Bugs Fixes:

  • For the very first time when played, the game can't save the highscore, only after reset the game, the highscore have been saved.
